about.title: Hi, I'm Portia
paragraphs: Piquant is a dining experience hosted by me Portia, in Berlin. The inspiration for my food is taken from my background as a British born Asian as well as having lived in London for 17 years.

I grew up eating my mother’s amazing food and learning about flavour combinations from her. I love to create dishes that break from tradition. Think chai infused creme caramel, padron peppers stuffed with masala or reinventing Indian classics like chana chaat masala but in a thepla cup.

I am very passionate about cooking and food, which means I create everything from scratch where possible. This includes all the spice mixes, any dough that I might use, to all the sauces, chutneys and marinades.
I host supper clubs at a secret location in Neukölln, the setting is warm and intimate with upto and no more than 10 people hosted at any one time. This allows for quality food and company.
I hope to see you there.
